title: @Ritito About the sej changes.
body:
I hate all of them, but that's not the issue at hand.

My issue is specifically about the sejuani dawnchaser skin
https://i.gyazo.com/9d446ccbf22e6c033c1197b6b7d562cf.png

Now obviously with the new passive every single sej skin has gained blue (or red, for comrade bear) particles as part of the skin. The issue lies with wear you guys decided to put your particles on this skin.

With every other skin, (except comrade bear) you have the bulk of the particles placed on the front of the skin 
https://i.gyazo.com/314195ff74814521c2b22cf02f302357.png https://i.gyazo.com/4ee236c12a32bc35f51def5b03472b5d.png https://i.gyazo.com/87a026eddf0ce1a8e7a13a731876147e.png https://i.gyazo.com/8ac7b8acb44a5c7b633de7d3e8592e0d.png

But with Sej'n'lion this was not made.

So now I'm going to as kthe obvious question. Why did you not put the blue on the mane? It would look cooler, and it would also be more readable due to being more like the other skins in her lineup.

replies.body: I can see where the blue on the front would be easier to see the passive but in my opinion it would look awful. Many people like myself that have bought that skin don't want to see a blue headed lion for 95 percent of the game because it would just be uglier than the live skin. I think the beast hunter one looks worse with the particles as well.

As it is it looks disgusting. PErsonally would prefer if it was golden on the mane, but that's asking a lot for a 750.

at any rate blue on the mane would look better than blue on saddle shields and anklets.

I don't agree with blue on the mane being an improvement but I do agree something should be done. It's going to make it look like a muppet if the outline it's giant head in blue. It should really be a different color altogether for that particular skin as well as the beast hunter. Bear cavalry doesn't have a giant blue bear head for good reason.

I'm tired of seein' the Blue Boar's already, THERE IS TOO MUCH BLUE ON THOSE BOARS NOW.   Like gosh darn no, don't do that. The ice Dinosaur is cool enough looking, but base Sejuani just died Bristles hair, the paint on Woad Sejuani COULD be better with a better color scheme, and Basic Base Ice Queen Sejuani looks just fine with the new blue.



but, I'm not a fan of having a blue boar.
ye, kinda wish different skins had different colors rather than just one receiving more colors.
NO!!! I HAVE THE BEAST ONE AND IT LOOKS DUUUUMB!
Wow they look ugly as fuck lol

It'd be nice to see Dawnchaser's saddle made gold. 

They could make Monster-hunter's ice like a sea-foam green.
To be fair, the skin coloration like this seems to be the easiest thing to change on the PBE and they have been pretty receptive to feedback as well.
